Potentially life-threatening circumstances can arise anywhere, anytime, and Clint Emersonâ€”former Navy SEALâ€”wants you to be prepared.

This complete course in survival teaches you how to prevent tracking, evade a kidnapping, elude an active shooter, rappel down the side of a building, immobilize a bad guy, protect yourself against cyber-criminals, and much moreâ€”all using low-tech to â€œno-techâ€ methods.
